ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // Reno
“The President is safe
because we're here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // Elena
“Just when I think the job's boring,
you guys start messing around.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // “I'm a good lookin' man once
I take my uniform off.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // “Booze, booze!
Ain't nothing like booze
when you're on the clock.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // “I'm sorry.
I'm closing this place down.”{PAUSE}“All my regular customers were
killed by Weapon.”{PAUSE}“Most of them were pretty weird,
but I had good memories of them.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “Hey G.I. Joe,
aren't you still on duty?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “I'm sorry. The bar is
only for Shinra employees.”

dialogStrings:
“Hey G.I. Joe,
aren't you still on duty?”

Reno
“The President is safe
because we're here.”

Elena
“Just when I think the job's boring,
you guys start messing around.”

“I'm sorry. The bar is
only for Shinra employees.”

“I'm a good lookin' man once
I take my uniform off.”

“Booze, booze!
Ain't nothing like booze
when you're on the clock.”

“I'm sorry.
I'm closing this place down.”{PAUSE}“All my regular customers were
killed by Weapon.”{PAUSE}“Most of them were pretty weird,
but I had good memories of them.”
